description:
T001 - Yew - Crown lift to 2.5m over footpath - not affecting spread and height
T007 (Tag no. 0126) - Lime - Repollard to previous pollard points - leaving spread height and width back to previous points, 18m in height and 7m in width approx.
T014 (Tag No. 0101) - False acacia - Remove dead wood
T018 - Sycamore (x 5) - Fell and treat stump
decision_conditions:
The specification is not suitable and therefore needs to be confirmed. The specification needs to be measurable and quantifiable so that we can understand the amount that is to be removed in meters. We need to know the amount to be removed and the remaining crown size. E.g. 2m crown reduction in width and 2m reduction in height, leaving a canopy spread of 3m and height of 5m for the following:

T001 - Yew - Crown lift to 2.5m over footpath
T007 (Tag no. 0126) - Lime - Repollard to previous pollard points
